Title: What Words Are Worth
Description:
Let me just grind these flowers and... there we are, all ready! 

Take these items and place them in the incense burner. Together with Bovan's necklace, I can entreat Ohn'ahra to help us find him. 

With luck, she will give us a vision.
ObjectivesText: Place the items in the incense burner and witness the vision.
